response.overview: WWF Home Video presents the Best Of The WWF 2001! Viewer's Choice. The 10 Best matches from 2001 as voted by, you, the fans. Plus, the top 5 shocks, kisses, slaps, put-downs & food moments of the year.  • Royal Rumble - Intercontinental Championship Ladder Match:  Chris Benoit vs. Chris Jericho  • No Way Out - 2-Out-Of-3-Falls:  Stone Cold Steve Austin vs. Triple H  • WrestleMania XVII - TLC II Match:  Edge & Christian vs. Hardy Boyz vs. Dudley Boyz  • WrestleMania XVII  Triple H vs. Undertaker  • WrestleMania XVII - Championship Match:  The Rock vs. Steve Austin  • Raw May 21st - Tag Team Championship Match:  Stone Cold Steve Austin & Triple H vs. Chris Jericho & Chris Benoit  • King Of The Ring - Street Fight:  Kurt Angle vs. Shane McMahon  • Invasion - Hardcore Championship:  Jeff Hardy vs. Rob Van Dam  • No Mercy - 1st Ever Lingerie Match:  Torrie Wilson vs. Stacey Keibler  • Survivor Series - Winner-Take-All Elimination Match:  Team WWF vs. Team Alliance.
response.title: Best Of The WWF 2001
